name: The Universe is Full Of Rocks
name_original: The Universe is Full Of Rocks
description:
The Universe Is Full Of Rocks

Inspired by Asteroids, The Universe is Full Of Rocks is a prototype I started developing back in 2016 just to test out different gameplay elements. While the game itself is quite simple, it can be fun playing locally with friends!

Controls

Keyboard :

Player 1

  • W - Accelerate
  • S - Brake (Enables shield with iframes)
  • A - Turn Left
  • D - Turn Right
  • Space - Shoot

Player 2

  • Up - Accelerate
  • Down - Brake (Enables shield with iframes)
  • Left - Turn Left
  • Right - Turn Right
  • Right Shift - Shoot

Controller :

All players

  • Right Trigger - Accelerate
  • Left Trigger - Brake (Enables shield with iframes)
  • Left Joystick - Turn
  • Right Button - Shoot
Powerups
  •  Rapid Fire
  •  Ricochet Shots
  •  Spread Shots
  •  Energy Shield
  •  Powerup - Increase Shooting Efficiency
Features
  • Infinite Wave Survival Mode
  • Player Versus Player
  • Up to 4 Player Coop/Versus
  • Full Controller Support
  • Buyable ship skins (not implemented)
  • Bosses (not implemented)

Music by FourFox
